content.text: Hello! I'm [user 2's name]. It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to dance, take pictures, and eat sweets.
I like to dance too! What kind of dancing do you like to do?
I like to do all kinds of dancing, but I'm best at ballroom and swing.
Ballroom and swing are so much fun! I used to take ballroom dancing lessons when I was younger.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to take lessons.
You should! It's a great way to learn a new skill and meet new people.
I'll definitely look into it. What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to build model cars. I've been collecting them since I was a kid.
That's really cool! I've never been into model cars, but I can see how they could be fun.
They're a great way to relax and de-stress. I also like to study abroad. I studied in Europe for a year when I was in college.
That must have been amazing! I've always wanted to study abroad, but I've never had the chance.
It was an amazing experience! I learned so much about different cultures and languages.
I'm sure you did! I'm glad you had a great time.
Thank you! I'm glad to meet you, [user 1's name].
It's nice to meet you too, [user 2's name].
